name: The Witch's Black Cat
description:
Abandoned by his previous owner, a black cat is all alone and caught in the rain, cold and hungry. A young girl named Aria finds the cat, takes him in as her own, and names him Whiskers. Turns out, Aria is a witch in training! However, she's still new to magic, so her mother refuses to let her keep him as her familiar. So, Aria and her mother work out a deal: if Aria can prove herself to be responsible, she can keep Whiskers and make him her familiar once she's more experienced. Will Aria prove herself? Will Whiskers get a good home?

Features:

  • A short and sweet story about a witch and her cat!
  • Schedule Aria and Whiskers's day by distributing their Energy Points into different tasks.
  • Be careful! They might get fatigued if they do too much work the day before!

This game was originally created for NaNoRenO 2018. Check out the game's game jam entry page here.
